function.description: Navigate to the BMI calculator page for users to access the tool.

Show the calculated BMI and its corresponding category (Underweight, Normal, Overweight, Obese).
Offer health tips based on the user's BMI category.

Present information about BMI and its significance for health.

Allows the user to upload 'Spring Semester Subjects.xlsx' file.

Parses the Excel data into a two-dimensional subject table format.

Outputs the organized subject table into a new Excel file for download.
Allows users to upload the Gamedata.xlsx file.
Preprocesses the dataset by applying a one-period lag to the 'result' column.
Sets 'result' as the lagged dependence variable.
Identifies all other columns as independence variables.
Creates a logistic regression model using preprocessed data.
Generates a summary of the logistic model.
Exports the model summary to Logistic.xlsx.
